title: What is that red liquid on riven's belt?
body: Like I notice it on arcade riven and just wondering what its used for? Is it some sort of enchantment for her weapon? Or like.....what?

replies.body:
THE BLOOD OF HER ENEMIES SO SHE CAN CRAFT THE ULTIMATE WEAPON TO DEFEAT THE LORD OF EVIL.

or an health pot.
well guess that solves one of life's greatest mysteries
I think it's a health pot.
Health potion was my assumption when I saw it :-)
Health potion, since that is the only thing in the game that she needs to buy to wreck everyone.
